projects.name: HyperGOAP
projects.description: A simple open-world game created in UE5 showcasing procedural terrain generation by using Markov Chain Models along with Goal-Oriented Action Planning (GOAP) AI architecture for NPCs.

projects.name: Illume
projects.description: A visually story rich game made with a low poly art style that follows the story of a girl and the future of the forest.

projects.name: Focus Breakout
projects.description: A 3D adventure game made in Unity where you play as a target orb trying to survive and escape the aim trainer simulation, all while tackling obstacles and puzzles over levels of varying difficulty.

projects.name: SAD
projects.description: A game engine created using C++ from the ground up with a team of 12 members. Game engine was created using ECS architecture. Engine features include: lighting, scripting, ray-casting, moving player-camera and rendering of 3D models and materials.
